revised_title: Gresham College and the Founding of the Royal Society
tldr: The article discusses the historical connection between Gresham College and the Royal Society, highlighting the role of Sir Thomas Gresham in founding Gresham College and its significance in the early development of science. Gresham College served as the birthplace and home of the Royal Society for almost fifty years, and its early professors and lecturers played a crucial role in the advancement of various scientific disciplines.
